        public java.awt.GridBagConstraints createGridBagConstraints(int x,
                                                            int y,
                                                            int width,
                                                            int height)
        Creats a GridBagConstraints object (used to set the relative position of a swing component on its parent component. (Don't fortget to set GridBagLayout on parent component.
        Parameters:
        x - - in px - direction: left to right
        y - - in px - direction: top to bottom
        width - - in columns
        height - - in rows
        Returns:
        a new GridBagConstraints object

      • setSize

        public java.awt.Component setSize(java.awt.Component component,
                                  int width,
                                  int height)
        Sets the size of a component. Short for calling setMaximumSize, setMinimimSize and setPreferredSize all by creating single Dimension object using createDimension
        Parameters:
        component - - any swing component
        width - - in px
        height - - in px
        Returns:
        the given component, now with a new size
